name: Squishy (AnnaTX, Uwuuuuuu, idleSoldier, ljt200210)
description:
An adventure game utilizing left mouse clicks. Included multiple enemy types and collectables. Contains 5 levels with increasing difficulty and a complete game loop.

Music downloaded from Pixabay: https://pixabay.com/music/

All player, enemy, and collectables assets downloaded from Unity Assets Store at: https://assetstore.unity.com/3d

Background designed by ourselves. One online frame was used available at: https://90sheji.com/sucai/40104376.html
